00076 // Precondition:
00077 // Parametre: double Pth_n
00078 // Signification: La pression a l'etape precedente
00079 // Valeurs par defaut:
00080 // Contraintes:
00081 // Acces: entree
00082 // Exception:
00083 // Effets de bord:
00084 // Postcondition:
00085 //
00086 //! Resoud l'EDO
00087 /** \return double<br>
00088 Signification: La nouvelle valeur de la pression<br>
00089 Contraintes: */
00090 
00091 
00092 double EDO_Pression_th_VDF_Gaz_Reel::resoudre(double Pth_n)
00093 {
00094   int n_bord ;
00095   for (n_bord=0; n_bord<la_zone->nb_front_Cl(); n_bord++)
00096     {
00097       const Cond_lim& la_cl = la_zone_Cl->les_conditions_limites(n_bord);
00098       if (sub_type(Neumann_sortie_libre, la_cl.valeur()))
00099         return Pth_n;
00100     }
00101 
00102   double Pth;
00103   const DoubleTab& tab_vit = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation()).vitesse();
00104   const DoubleTab& tab_hnp1 = le_fluide_->inco_chaleur().valeurs();       //actuel
00105   const DoubleTab& tab_hn = le_fluide_->inco_chaleur().passe();        //passe
00106   const DoubleTab& tab_rho = le_fluide_->masse_volumique().valeurs();    //actuel
00107   const Loi_Etat& loi_ = le_fluide_->loi_etat();
00108 // const DoubleVect& tab_rhon = loi_->rho_n();                       //passe
00109 
00110   int elem, nb_elem=la_zone->nb_elem(),i;
00111   double V = 0; //mesure du domaine
00112   double Fn = 0; //integrale 1 a l'etape n
00113   double Fnp1 = 0; //integrale 1 a l'etape n+1
00114   double S = 0; //second membre
00115 
00116   double dt = le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation().schema_temps().pas_de_temps();
00117   double v,al,b, bnp1, hn,hnp1, divu;
00118 
00119   const IntTab& elem_faces = la_zone->elem_faces();
00120   DoubleTrav divU(tab_vit.dimension(0), 1);
00121   ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,le_fluide_->vitesse()->equation()).operateur_divergence().calculer(tab_vit,divU);
00122   DoubleTrav gradh(tab_vit.dimension(0));
00123   DoubleTrav Hstar(tab_vit.dimension(0));
00124   for (elem=0 ; elem<nb_elem ; elem++)
00125     {
00126       Hstar(elem) = .5*(tab_hn(elem)+tab_hnp1(elem));
00127     }
00128   calculer_grad(Hstar,gradh);
00129   DoubleTab u_gradh(nb_elem);
00130   int f1,f2;
00131   for (elem=0 ; elem<nb_elem ; elem++)
00132     {
00133       u_gradh(elem)=0;
00134       for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00135         {
00136           f1 = elem_faces(elem,i);
00137           f2 = elem_faces(elem,i+dimension);
00138           u_gradh(elem) += .25* (gradh(f1)+gradh(f2)) * (tab_vit(f1)+tab_vit(f2));
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142   for (elem=0 ; elem<nb_elem ; elem++)
00143     {
00144       v = la_zone->volumes(elem);
00145       V += v;
00146       hn   = tab_hn(elem);
00147       hnp1 = tab_hnp1(elem);
00148       al = loi_->Drho_DT(Pth_n,hn) / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hn);
00149       b = tab_rho(elem) / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hn);
00150       bnp1 = tab_rho(elem) / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth_n,hnp1);
00151 // S += al.dh/dt
00152       S -= v*al * ((hnp1-hn)/dt);
00153       divu = divU(elem);
00154 // S -= al.u.gradT*
00155       S -= v*al * u_gradh(elem);
00156 // F += b.div(U)
00157       Fn += v*b * divu;
00158       Fnp1 += v*bnp1 * divu;
00159     }
00160 
00161   Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-Fn);
00162 // Cerr<<"Volume="<<V<<finl;
00163 // Cerr<<"Fn="<<Fn<<finl;
00164 // Cerr<<"S="<<S<<finl;
00165 // Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (expl) = "<<Pth<<finl;
00166   Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-.5*(Fn+Fnp1));
00167 // Cerr<<"Fnp1="<<Fnp1<<finl;
00168 // Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (impl) = "<<Pth<<finl;
00169   double tmp=0,r;
00170   int k=0;
00171   while (fabs(tmp-Pth)/Pth>1e-9 && k++<20)
00172     {
00173       tmp = Pth;
00174       Fnp1 = 0;
00175       for (elem=0 ; elem<nb_elem ; elem++)
00176         {
00177           v = la_zone->volumes(elem);
00178           hnp1 = tab_hnp1(elem);
00179           r = loi_->calculer_masse_volumique(Pth,hnp1);
00180           bnp1 = r / loi_->Drho_DP(Pth,hnp1);
00181           for (i=0 ; i<dimension ; i++)
00182             {
00183               Fnp1 += v*bnp1 * (tab_vit(elem_faces(elem,i+dimension))-tab_vit(elem_faces(elem,i)))/la_zone->dim_elem(elem,i);
00184             }
00185         }
00186       Pth = Pth_n + dt/V *(S-.5*(Fn+Fnp1));
00187 // Cerr<<"Fnp1="<<Fnp1<<finl;
00188       Cerr<<"Pression thermo recalculee (impl"<<k<<") = "<<Pth<<finl;
00189     }
00190 
00191   return Pth;
00192 }
